content: a kreinik website design by michele wilcox skill level intermediate *crochet is so trendy right now for clothing purses and embellishments make this quick and easy purse for a child teen or yourself to enjoy this summer season kreinik manufacturing * materials needed * kreinik medium #16 braid two spools of 032 pearl two spools 008 green one spool 091 star yellow one spool 094 star blue * stuffing * small amounts of dark pink and blue embroidery floss for embroidery accents * size c crochet hook written directions are provided in pdf download
